entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HotReload files generated in a wrong path for MAUI Blazor projects #26762

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Update the base path to use IntermediateOutputPath #26765
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • [24068] Remove Legacy -- behavior and use of UnparsedTokens #26761
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.1xx
  • Move the nuget cache creation into the work item creation class #26764
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Detect invalid package locales and warn the user #26729
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet/templating#3829 evaluating project context for dotnet new execution #26523
    Area-Infrastructure
  • MSBuild server V2 #26104
    Area-CLI
  • Migrate dotnet new Cli, dotnet-new3, *.IntegrationTests, *.UnitTests, template_feed to SDK #26521
    Area-Templates
